The ninja assassin story is indeed v=
ery popular. The ninja was said 
to have hid in the lavatory, more like a l=
atrine for three days 
waiting for his target to come to that particular on=
e, when the 
target did indeed arrive he was stabbed from below [yes the ni=
nja was 
stood in the actual sewer stream] and killed.

This story blossome=
d from the rumours that the Oda had him 
assassinated. This was mainly due =
to the timely death which benefited 
the Oda enormously.

However, many Jap=
anese scholars believe he contracted a severe 
illness, stomach cancer is m=
entioned, and thereby died.

The legend of the assassination is a little mo=
re colourful but a lot 
less likely - but who knows
